sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RUNCIMAN John (1744-1766), historical painter, a younger brother of the above, accompanied him to Rome, and died at Naples in 1766. He was an artist of great promise. His Flight into Egypt, in the National Gallery of Scotland, is remarkable for the precision of its execution and the mellow richness of its colouring.
